head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Brooklyn: Arrest In Synagogue Burglaries

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Brooklyn: Arrest In Synagogue Burglaries

body.head.byline: By Andy Newman (NYT) (Compiled by Anthony Ramirez)

abstract.p: Mark Cukierwar is arrested on charge of dressing like Orthodox Jew and burglarizing synagogues in Sheepshead Bay and Midwood sections of Brooklyn (S)

block.p: A man who dressed as an Orthodox Jew and burglarized nine synagogues in Sheepshead Bay and Midwood in recent weeks has been arrested, the authorities said yesterday. From Dec. 28 until about Saturday, the man, Mark Cukierwar, 31, dressed in yarmulke and black suit, broke into the synagogues after hours and stole money from the collection boxes, said Carl Kruger, the local state senator, who announced the arrest. Senator Kruger said Mr. Cukierwar was Jewish but not Orthodox. In late December, Mr. Cukierwar fled a drug treatment center, where he was serving part of his sentence for a prior synagogue burglary, Senator Kruger said.
